Articles.Content:
So my situation is I have a station in orbit, and I'm trying to launch a mobile processing lab up to the station, however, whenever I launch my vehicle once I get to 6 km the lab completely disappears. The docking port I have attached to the top of it is still there as well as the inter-stage attached to the bottom. It's like it's just invisible. As well as this I'm experiencing the camera glitch where is slowly slights behind the vehicle further and further.

 This is only the case with this one particular vehicle. I even made a completely new vehicle with a lab, but much simpler design to keep part count down, but it still persists. All of my other vehicles work fine, no camera glitch or anything.

 I'm running on 1.1.2 on RSS/RO/RP-01 with a total of 48 mods. I haven't added anymore mods, nor updated anything to make this happen. Also before anyone says ram I upgraded to 16 Gb just for KSP lol

If anyone knows what's going on please let me know, I haven't found a single thing on this (besides the camera glitch).
Ok. Problem solved. I upgraded my save to 1.1.3 and that seems to have fixed everything. Have the lab added to new node on station.
